// Pivot 0, 0
int circle1[22] = {
	3, 4,
	8, 0,
	19, 0,
	24, 4,
	27, 11,
	26, 21,
	19, 27,
	9, 27,
	1, 22,
	-1, 12,
	0, 7
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float circle1[22] = {
	0.111111f, 0.148148f,
	0.296296f, 0.000000f,
	0.703704f, 0.000000f,
	0.888889f, 0.148148f,
	1.000000f, 0.407407f,
	0.962963f, 0.777778f,
	0.703704f, 1.000000f,
	0.333333f, 1.000000f,
	0.037037f, 0.814815f,
	-0.037037f, 0.444444f,
	0.000000f, 0.259259f
};
